Review Date: 2017/01/27
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'Español (España)', 'Italiano', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Polski', '日本語', 'Português', 'Deutsch', 'Français'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'العربية', 'Čeština', 'Dansk', 'Deutsch', 'Ελληνικά', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Español (España)', 'Suomi', 'Filipino', 'Français', 'עברית', 'हिन्दी', 'Magyar', 'Indonesia', 'Italiano', '日本語', '한국어', 'Bahasa Melayu', 'Norsk Bokmål', 'Nederlands', 'Polski', 'Português (Brasil)', 'Português (Portugal)', 'Română', 'Русский', 'Svenska', 'தமிழ்', 'తెలుగు', 'ไทย', 'Türkçe', '中文（简体）', '中文（繁體）'], 'Directors': ['Lawrence Trilling', 'Alik Sakharov', "Bill D'Elia", 'Anthony Hemingway'], 'Producers': ['David E. Kelley', 'Jonathan Shapiro', 'Lawrence Trilling', 'Ross Fineman', 'David Semel', 'Robert Lewis'], 'Starring': ['Billy Bob Thornton', 'William Hurt', 'Maria Bello'], 'Studio': ['Amazon Studios']}
Review Text: Loved it. We are running out of things to watch on Amazon, and chose this by default. We really enjoyed the layered characters and plot twists.
Review Title: Great characters and plot
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
